name: Save Christmas
description:
You and Santa Claus flew to distribute gifts to children. Passing one of the forests, Santa Claus lost control and crashed into a tree, all the gifts scattered through the forest with zombies. Your task is to collect all the gifts, kill all the zombies and resurrect Santa Claus.
You play for the Snow Maiden, the scene is the forest. A large number of zombies are opposing you alone. Your task is to collect all the gifts. You have in your arsenal 6 units of various weapons with which you can kill zombies.
Test your strength on a beautiful map. Show your skills as a detective and shooter.

  • Enemy difficulty level
  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 different weapons
  • Advanced AI
